metadata.feature_description: Provides adaptive user interface that works across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.expected: PersonaBar and website should display full desktop layout
steps.actual: PersonaBar displayed with full sidebar, expanded panels, all table columns visible

steps.action: Opened Dashboard panel at desktop resolution
steps.expected: Dashboard should display Site Analytics with full layout
steps.actual: Dashboard displayed with Insights section, Top Fives grid, date picker, and Summary/Traffic tabs

steps.action: Resized browser to 768x1024 tablet portrait resolution
steps.expected: UI should adapt to tablet size with responsive menu
steps.actual: Menu button appeared for collapsed navigation, content reflowed to 2-column layout for products

steps.action: Opened PersonaBar Manage panel at tablet resolution
steps.expected: Panel should adapt to tablet width
steps.actual: Panel displayed full width with Manage submenu visible, Users table adapted for tablet

steps.action: Resized browser to 375x667 mobile portrait resolution
steps.expected: UI should adapt to narrow mobile width
steps.actual: PersonaBar panel took full width, only NAME column visible in users table, content stacked vertically

steps.expected: Dashboard should display in mobile-friendly stacked layout
steps.actual: Site Analytics displayed with Insights and Top Fives sections in stacked layout

issues: At 375px width, some modal buttons were outside viewport - required landscape orientation or larger screen to access

steps.expected: UI should adapt to landscape mobile orientation
steps.actual: Landscape provided more horizontal space, modal buttons became accessible, content displayed correctly

steps.expected: UI should display tablet landscape layout
steps.actual: Dashboard displayed with 3-column Top Fives grid, SUMMARY/TRAFFIC tabs visible, Menu button present

steps.action: Clicked Menu button at tablet/mobile resolution
steps.expected: Navigation should expand to show all page links
steps.actual: Menu expanded showing full vertical navigation list with all page links including submenus with arrow indicators

steps.expected: UI should adapt at tablet/desktop transition point
steps.actual: UI displayed tablet-like layout with Menu button visible, navigation accessible through hamburger menu

steps.expected: UI should scale correctly without breaking layout
steps.actual: UI scaled properly, text and elements remained readable, navigation wrapped to multiple rows, PersonaBar icons enlarged appropriately

observations: PersonaBar sidebar remains visible across all screen sizes, maintaining consistent admin access
CSS media queries at 768px and 1024px breakpoints function correctly based on code review
JavaScript in evoq.js includes viewport detection for tablet landscape (>768px and <=1024px) and portrait (<=768px) modes
Main website navigation collapses to hamburger menu at smaller screen sizes while PersonaBar maintains icon-based sidebar
At very narrow mobile widths (375px), some modal dialogs may have buttons outside visible viewport - users would need to scroll or rotate device
